code: import Box from"@mui/material/Box";import{DataGrid}from"@mui/x-data-grid";import{v4 as uuidv4}from"uuid";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var columns=[{field:"studentID",headerName:"Student ID"},{field:"studentName",headerName:"Student Name",width:150},{field:"classID",headerName:"Class ID"},{field:"className",headerName:"Class Name"},{field:"semester",headerName:"Semester"},{field:"finalGrade",headerName:"Final Grade"}];export var GradeTable=function GradeTable(_ref){var studentGrades=_ref.studentGrades,studentDetails=_ref.studentDetails,classTitleId=_ref.classTitleId,classAssignments=_ref.classAssignments;var classTitle=classTitleId[0];var classId=classTitleId[1];var rows=studentDetails.map(function(student,index){if(Array.isArray(student)){var s=student[0];var studentId=s.universityId;var currStudentGrade=studentGrades.filter(function(s){return s.studentId===studentId;});if(Array.isArray(currStudentGrade)){var _s=currStudentGrade[0];var unweightedGrade=_s.grades[0];var unweightedGradeKeys=Object.keys(unweightedGrade);var weightedGrade=0;unweightedGradeKeys.map(function(a){var ass=classAssignments.find(function(assignment){return assignment.assignmentId===a;});if(ass){var assignmentWeight=ass.weight;var gradeValue=parseFloat(unweightedGrade[a]);weightedGrade+=assignmentWeight*gradeValue;}});weightedGrade/=100;return{id:uuidv4(),studentID:studentId,studentName:_s.name,classID:classId,className:classTitle,semester:"fall2022",finalGrade:weightedGrade};}}});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{height:400,width:"100%"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DataGrid,{rows:rows,columns:columns,pageSize:10})});};
